leads.title: ACAN - Molten Metal Slag Measurement System
leads.description:
Please note that late submissions will not be considered or accepted.

Description of Requirement:
 Department of National Resources Canada (NRCan) has a requirement for a molten metal/slag measurement system: measuring temperature, oxygen, determining carbon, liquid metal sampling, calculating slag condition, determining metal bath level and slag height. This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is to signal the government's intention to award a contract for these goods to Asbury Wilkinson Inc.
leads.organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
